info.description: HTTP REST API for Takhin Console - manage topics, messages, and consumer groups
info.title: Takhin Console API

get.description: Get all ACL entries, optionally filtered

delete.description: Delete ACL entries matching the filter

put.description: Update configuration for multiple topics at once

get.description: Retrieve configuration for a specific topic

put.description: Update configuration for a specific topic

get.description: Get a list of all consumer groups with their status
Get detailed information about a specific consumer group
Check comprehensive health status of all components
Check if the service is alive (Kubernetes liveness probe)
Check if the service is ready to accept traffic (Kubernetes readiness probe)
Get real-time cluster monitoring metrics including throughput, latency, and consumer lag
Establishes a WebSocket connection for real-time monitoring metrics updates
Get a list of all topics with their partition information

post.description: Create a new topic with the specified number of partitions
Create multiple topics in a single transactional operation

delete.description: Delete multiple topics in a single operation

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific topic

delete.description: Delete a topic and all its data

get.description: Fetch messages from a specific topic partition

parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to return
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Send a message to a specific topic partition
post.summary: Produce a message to a topic

ApiKeyAuth.description: API Key authentication. Use 'your-api-key' or 'Bearer your-api-key' format.
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
